meanings.definition: A type of mushroom with a brightly colored cap and gills underneath.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor was dotted with russulas of various hues.
meanings.sent2: I picked a handful of russulas to study their unique colors.
meanings.sent3: The russulas seemed to be having a colorful party under the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden where russulas of thoughts bloomed brightly.
meanings.sent5: The russulas stood out like vibrant jewels in the green carpet of the woods.

meanings.definition: Plural form of russula, referring to multiple mushrooms of this type.
meanings.sent1: The basket was filled with russulas picked during the foraging trip.
meanings.sent2: We cooked a delicious stew using the fresh russulas we found.
meanings.sent3: The russulas in the kitchen seemed to be whispering cooking secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a patchwork quilt of russulas, each one a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sautéed russulas filled the room with earthy goodness.
